title: DPM/FM Dar conveys condolences over Thailand Queen Sirikit’s death
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 26 (APP): Deputy Prime Minister/Foreign Minister Senator Mohammad Ishaq Dar, Sunday, expressed his deep grief over the death of Queen Sirikit, the beloved Queen Mother of Thailand.

“Deeply saddened by the passing of Her Majesty Queen Sirikit, the beloved Queen Mother of Thailand,” the DPM/FM posted on X handle.

He also extended his heartfelt condolences to King Maha Vajiralongkorn, the Royal Family and the people of Thailand.

“Our thoughts and prayers are with the Thai nation in this moment of profound sorrow,” he further posted.
